TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JumpPath extends System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem

summary.span: 表示指向 Windows 7 任务栏跳转列表中所显示的文件的链接。

span.span: Represents a link to a file that is displayed in a Windows 7 taskbar Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是对可从 [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] 任务栏跳转列表打开的文件的引用。A is a reference to a file that can be opened from a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar Jump List. 如果你的应用程序未注册为处理该项的文件类型，则该文件将不会显示在跳转列表中。If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, the file will not appear in the Jump List. 例如，如果将添加 到 .txt 文件中，则必须注册应用程序才能处理 .txt 文件。For example, if you add a to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.

summary.span: 获取或设置要包含在跳转列表中的文件的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the file to be included in the Jump List.

value.span: 要包含在跳转列表中的文件的路径。

span.span: The path to the file to be included in the Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须注册应用程序才能处理指定文件的文件扩展名;否则，将拒绝该项。The application must be registered to handle the file name extension of the specified file; otherwise, the item is rejected. 例如，如果将添加 到 .txt 文件中，则必须注册应用程序才能处理 .txt 文件。For example, if you add a to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
